response.original_title: ALL OF ONE COMPANY - HMS COVENTRY ROYAL NAVY 1980's RECRUITING FILM
response.overview: All Of One Company is a 1980 documentary showing daily life aboard the ill fated HMS Coventry—including daily chores, mock drills, and resupplying at sea—during its ten-day voyage from Portsmouth to Hong Kong via Singapore. In Portsmouth, members of the Coventry’s crew carry supplies off the ship. The gangplank is pushed back and the Royal Navy destroyer leaves the dock.
response.title: ALL OF ONE COMPANY - HMS COVENTRY ROYAL NAVY 1980's RECRUITING FILM
